<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables copilot actions, toggles availability of the actions related to copilots, such as taking over controls, suspending controls, etc. This command triggers <tt>"ControlsShifted"</tt> event handler.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> In multiplayer, execute this command globally to have it synced on all clients</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''enableCopilot''' enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle on which to toggle copilot actions
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] - enable or disable

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (![[isCopilotEnabled]] myHeli) [[then]] { myHeli [[enableCopilot]] [[true]] };
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isCopilotEnabled]], [[currentPilot]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->

<dt class="note">[[User:Strangepete|Strangepete]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Only enables the user actions, not who is in control - pilot can lock or unlock co-pilot controls in multiplayer while still true.<br>
* Actions: [[Arma_3:_Actions#LockVehicleControl|LockVehicleControl]], [[Arma_3:_Actions#UnlockVehicleControl|UnlockVehicleControl]], [[Arma_3:_Actions#SuspendVehicleControl|SuspendVehicleControl]] and [[Arma_3:_Actions#TakeVehicleControl|TakeVehicleControl]]<br>
* You can use the [[Arma 3: Event Handlers#ControlsShifted|Arma 3 Event Handler - ControlsShifted]] to detect [[Arma_3:_Actions#TakeVehicleControl|Take]] and [[Arma_3:_Actions#SuspendVehicleControl|Release]] actions
